response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. The product is valued at $1,000,000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $900,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties receive value from this transaction, allowing you to maximize the benefits while also providing me with a fair return for my investment. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to discussing its details further.", "product_price": 900000}
